Articles.Content:
Hi I decided to help out with the hollow asteroids idea. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/74039-Hollow-asteroids?p=1049628#post1049628

This will be my first ksp mod and I'm currently soaking up all the information in the on add-on development forum.

Cheers Banana Hat
Welcome aboard Banana Hat, looks like a promising project
Welcome aboard! I hope to see some good work soon!
'Allo there! Looks promising, keep it up.
Hello and good luck! Programming can be a very fulfilling hobby or career. Just be careful not to get burned out doing overnight coding sessions.

Hello and good luck! Programming can be a very fulfilling hobby or career. Just be careful not to get burned out doing overnight coding sessions.

already on the career part of it I'm working on mobile apps right now. modding KSP seems quite a bit different though.

You guys are amazingly nice!
Welcome and thank you for contributing so early in your forum-life
